ROM.Changelog:
##### Android 8.0.1 - Mx5 Build 18.6.1 Full details are available on our official blog.
* Performance tweaks and improvements * Merging of user-contributed app translations * Addition of the MxPlus Store app * Minor user experience improvements
**Updates to the following applications:**
* AndroidFrameworkRes - MX5.1_2018B_20180601 * CSCAppResource - 20180601 * MiixLauncher - 20180601 * Hy_OTA - 5.1.3_20180601 * ThemeCenter - 5.1.3_20180601 * WallpaperPicker - 20180601
**Notes:**
* Booting after the update may take time * You may experience lagging for the first 15-25 minutes after updating
**If you download updates over a data connection or while roaming, additional data charges may apply. It is advised to keep your device fully charged during the update.**
